thread.title: In the top 3
thread.title_full: In the top 3 - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Glen27
title: In the top 3
text:
The Goring is one of the very few hotels that you feel comfortable in the second you walk through the door.
The service is probably the best i have encountered in any of the so called best hotels in the world and i have been vey lucky enough to stay in a few.
Every rooms attention to detail is spot on, from the wall paper to the soap dish, all eloquent and fitting of a luxury hotel.
From the door man to the manager every member of staff is as they should be, with the customers wishes and comfort being the main priority.
I only stayed last week because i needed to catch the Gatwick express, and its probably a few years ago i visited it for the first time, and loved it.
I can only wonder how i could have been so silly not to make it my first choice of London hotel when visiting the capital on business and pleasure.
Its one of the only establishments in town where service matters more than money, and a few grand hotels are slipping the wrong way shall we say, no names mentioned.
Room Tip: Every room is to a high standard. See more room tips
